TLE.USER_NAME ,TLE.USER_BIRTH ,TLE.USER_SEX ,TLE.PROCESS_CD ,TLE.CAREER_TYP ,FN_CD_DTL('CAR001',TLE.CAREER_TYP) AS CAREER_TYP_NM ,TLE.COMPANY_GUBUN ,TLE.EXAM_CERT_NO ,TLE.DEPLOMA_NO ,CASE WHEN TLE.CAREER_TYP = '1' THEN TO_DATE(TLE.EXAM_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') WHEN TLE.CAREER_TYP = '2' THEN TO_DATE(TLE.PASS_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') ELSE '' END AS COMP_DATE ,TO_CHAR(TLE.CREATE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATE_DATE FROM TB_LC_EDU01 TLE
AND TLE.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%')
AND TLE.DEPLOMA_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{srchInput},'%') OR TLE.EXAM_CERT_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{srchInput},'%')
